description:
When trying to disprove ghosts, the true evil spirits may just be people. It’s best to be grateful for whatever you can get, especially around Christmas. Besides, at least you didn’t get bit by a dog.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyday Life No. 93 / Everyday Life No. 94 / Love-like / Reign / Short Thoughts / A Certain Christmas Short / Helvetica Standard / Trap / Everyday Life No. 95 / Dash to Freedom / Everyday Life No. 96
